title: Celeste
description: A challenging platformer about climbing a mountain, featuring tight controls, memorable characters, and a touching story about overcoming anxiety and self-doubt.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Explore a vast, interconnected underground kingdom filled with quirky characters, deadly enemies, and hidden secrets in this beautifully hand-drawn action-adventure.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Build the farm of your dreams, explore caves, befriend townsfolk, and discover the magic of rural life in this beloved farming simulation RPG.

title: Undertale
description: A unique RPG where nobody has to die. Navigate a quirky underground world filled with humor, heart, and memorable characters with multiple story paths.

title: Dead Cells
description: A roguelike action-platformer with fluid combat, permanent death, and no checkpoints. Master tight gameplay and explore an ever-changing castle.

title: Cuphead
description: A classic run-and-gun action game with hand-drawn 1930s cartoon aesthetics, challenging boss battles, and a jazz soundtrack.

title: Terraria
description: Dig, fight, explore, and build in this 2D sandbox adventure. Craft weapons, summon bosses, and create your own world with endless possibilities.

title: Hades
description: Defy the god of the dead as you battle out of the Underworld in this fast-paced roguelike with stunning art, engaging story, and addictive gameplay.

title: A Short Hike
description: A relaxing exploration game about hiking to the top of a mountain. Talk to quirky characters, discover hidden treasures, and enjoy the peaceful journey.

title: Into the Breach
description: Control powerful mechs to defend civilization against giant creatures in this turn-based strategy game with perfect information and endless replayability.

title: Slay the Spire
description: Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, and climb the Spire in this fusion of card games and roguelikes with hundreds of cards to discover.

title: Outer Wilds
description: Explore a hand-crafted solar system trapped in a time loop. Uncover mysteries, piece together clues, and discover the secrets of an ancient alien race.

title: Gris
description: A serene and evocative experience about a young girl dealing with painful experiences. No danger, no death—just a beautiful journey through sorrow.

title: Risk of Rain 2
description: Fight through hordes of monsters in this multiplayer roguelike. Combine loot and discover synergies to survive increasingly difficult challenges.

title: Limbo
description: A dark and atmospheric puzzle platformer about a boy searching for his sister. Solve environmental puzzles in a haunting monochrome world.

title: Firewatch
description: A first-person mystery set in the Wyoming wilderness. Your only contact is the voice on the other end of a handheld radio as strange events unfold.

title: Don't Starve Together
description: Survive in a harsh wilderness with quirky characters. Gather resources, craft items, and battle strange creatures in this multiplayer survival game.

title: Fez
description: A 2D platformer with a twist—rotate the world to reveal hidden paths. Explore a beautiful pixelated world filled with secrets and perspective puzzles.

title: The Binding of Isaac
description: A randomly generated action RPG shooter with heavy roguelike elements. Battle through dungeons filled with disturbing enemies and bizarre power-ups.

title: Bastion
description: An action RPG featuring dynamic narration that responds to your actions. Build the Bastion while exploring a shattered world with stunning visuals.

title: Inside
description: A dark, narrative-driven platformer from the creators of Limbo. Solve puzzles and avoid capture in a dystopian world with a mind-bending twist.

title: Faster Than Light
description: Manage a spaceship and crew in this challenging roguelike strategy game. Make tactical decisions in real-time space battles across procedurally generated sectors.

title: Hotline Miami
description: A high-octane action game with brutal combat and a gripping storyline. Navigate neon-soaked levels with an incredible synthwave soundtrack.

title: Ori and the Blind Forest
description: A stunning hand-painted platformer with emotional storytelling. Navigate challenging platforming sequences and discover new abilities in a magical forest.
